title: Bloomberg Launches Green Bond-Tilted Versions of its Flagship Fixed Income Indices - ESG Today
summary: Bloomberg has launched green-tilted versions of its fixed income indices, including Global Aggregate, Treasury, and Corporate Indices, to enable investors to increase exposure to sustainable investments. These new indices, such as the '20% Green Bond' and '3x Green Bond Tilted' versions, offer investors the opportunity to achieve higher returns while aligning their investments with environmental sustainability goals. The indices can be further customized to meet specific needs, including business involvement exclusions, EU Taxonomy inputs, regulatory screens, and custom sector weightings.
